local_intent: Lower slowly to make gentle contact with the T-block at the pre-push pose and verify contact, retrying if needed.
assumptions: Pre-push pose has been computed and stored as 'prepush_pose'; TCP yaw already set to 0.
coherence_with_global: Implements the contact verification step using slow approach and retries if contact not detected, matching the GLOBAL_BT and failure-and-recovery policy.
